snippet: The Pakistani military issued a statement criticizing claims by American officials that Pakistan had used the C.I.A. drone program as cover for its own operations in the tribal belt.
abstract: Pakistani military denies suggestions by American officials that Pakistan had used CIA drone program as cover for its own military operations in tribal belt.
lead_paragraph: The Pakistani military issued a statement criticizing claims by American officials that Pakistan had used the C.I.A. drone program as cover for its own operations in the tribal belt.

headline.seo: Pakistan Rejects U.S. Disavowal of Drone Strikes
headline.main: Pakistan Rejects U.S. Disavowal of Drone Strikes
headline.print_headline: Pakistan Disputes U.S. Disclaimer on Drone Strikes
